description: You will learn how to change lives, how to make people's surgical experiences the best they can be. As an onsite coach, your job is one of the most important there is! You are the connection - the liaison - between the patient, their family, the surgical team, the hospital staff and the bariatric program. Patients depend on you for accurate information, for emotional support and for compassion during this difficult time. You are the one person they will remember most during their journey. You have the chance to make a real and lasting difference in someone's life!
title: Become an Amazing Onsite Coach
